content: अभिया {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To go up to, approach, go or repair to; अभिययौ स हिमाचलमुच्छ्रितं <ls>Ki. 5. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 27.</ls> {@--2@} To come or draw near (without an object); come (as time). {@--3@} To march against, attack, assail, encounter; कुबेरादभियास्यमानात् <ls>R. 5. 30</ls>; <ls>Dk. 30.</ls> {@--4@} To give or resign oneself to, devote, attach or betake oneself to. {@--5@} To partake or share in, get, obtain. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To send away.
